title: Handle Incorrect Room Rate Charge
description: A guest claims the rate charged on their folio is higher than the rate quoted in their confirmation email.

tasks.description: Retrieve the guest's folio and their original reservation confirmation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up both the bill and the initial booking confirmation.

tasks.description: Compare the rate on the folio with the confirmed rate and identify the discrepancy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the rate on the folio is incorrect.

tasks.description: Adjust the room rate on the folio to match the confirmed rate for all nights of the stay.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully corrects the billing error.
